title: Houkago no! Iruma-kun
description:
An official [i]Mairimashita! Iruma-kun[/i] anthology series, featuring stories of Iruma Suzuki and friends's adventures as students of Babyls Demon School.
[hr][b][u]TABLE OF CONTENTS:[/u][/b]
[spoiler][u][b]CHAPTER 1[/b] - [i]Iruma-sama Caught On Camera![/i][/u]
[b]Mangaka: [/b] [i]Hachi ([url=https://mangadex.org/title/22705/majo-no-kaigashuu]The Witch's Bloody Paintings[/url])[/i]
Eiko and Asmodeus meet in private to share with each other some photos that they've secretly taken of Iruma. 

[u][b]CHAPTER 2[/b] - [i]I Just Haven't Given It My Best Yet[/i][/u]
[b]Mangaka:[/b] [i]Saori Muronaga ([url=https://mangadex.org/title/41110/all-alone-in-hyakki-demon-village]All Alone in Hyakki Demon Village[/url])[/i]
Opera laments their inability to get a good photo of Iruma, so they decide to train with Iruma in order to do so.

[u][b]CHAPTER 3[/b] - [i]???[/i][/u]
[b]Mangaka:[/b] [i]Nango Kouta ([url=https://mangadex.org/title/33201/kojirase-hyakki-dominor]Kojirase Hyakki Dominor[/url])[/i]

[u][b]CHAPTER 4[/b] - [i]???[/i][/u]
[b]Mangaka:[/b] [i]Shinobi ([url=https://mangadex.org/title/489/yandere-kanojo]Yandere Kanojo[/url])[/i]

[u][b]CHAPTER 5[/b] - [i]???[/i][/u]
[b]Mangaka:[/b] [i]Rio ([url=https://mangadex.org/title/19968/zetsubou-danshi-to-chuugoku-musume]Despair Boy and China Girl[/url])[/i]

[u][b]CHAPTER 6[/b] - [i]???[/i][/u]
[b]Mangaka:[/b] [i]Sako Misaki ([url=https://mangadex.org/title/56047/doki-doki-yokai-love-battle-great-yokai-war]Doki Doki Yokai Love Battle! ~ Great Yokai War![/url])[/i]

[u][b]CHAPTER 7[/b] - [i]???[/i][/u]
[b]Mangaka:[/b] [i]Shimotsuki Seira[/i]

[u][b]CHAPTER 8[/b] - [i]???[/i][/u]
[b]Mangaka:[/b] [i]Nagi Mayuko[/i]

[u][b]CHAPTER 9[/b] - [i]???[/i][/u]
[b]Mangaka:[/b] [i]Matsumetsu[/i]

[u][b]CHAPTER 10[/b] - [i]???[/i][/u]
[b]Mangaka:[/b] [i]Kakemaru Kakeru ([url=https://mangadex.org/title/52114/shounen-racquet]Shonen Racquet[/url])[/i]
[/spoiler]
